title: Green synthesis of cobalt ferrite from rotten passion fruit juice and application as an electrocatalyst for the hydrogen evolution reaction
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00450C, Paper
Open Access

Rochelin Prosper Medang, Roussin Lontio Fomekong, Edwin Akongnwi Nforna, Hypolite Mathias Kamta Tedjieukeng, Cédrik Ngnintedem Yonti, Patrice Kenfack Tsobnang, John Lambi Ngolui, Dieudonné Bitondo
Green synthesis of an efficient and low-cost electrocatalyst for hydrogen evolution reaction (HER) in a basic medium is highly desirable for renewable energy conversion. Here in, cobalt-ferrite (CoFe2O4) was prepared...
